name: rdprxy
description: A proxy created for serving HTTP requests from Roblox to Discord or Roblox.

ACCESS_KEY.description: This is basically the password for your API to prevent other people from mailiciously accessing it. It is initially autogenerated but can be changed afterwards if needed.

ALLOWED_HOSTS.description: A comma separated list of additional hosts (no spaces) to allow with the desired protocol in the format protocol:host. Below are the default hosts, don't touch them unless you know what you're doing.
